text:
Nicholas Reilly for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 3:49 pm This is too exciting and we’re getting our family onboard immediately (Picture: ITV) 
Most of us watch The Chase from the comfort of our own homes – often doing battle with our families in a bid to outfox them in the knowledge stakes. 
But now, you could be soon teaming up with your entire brood to defeat the chaser – after ITV allegedly ordered a family version of the show. Bradley Walsh jumps to Jenny Ryan’s defence as contestant on The Chase calls her ‘chubby cheeks’ 
According to BroadcastNow , The Family Chase will see a team of four relatives gearing up to win a cash pot – a welcome contrast to the strangers that contestants are usually paired up with. 
It will reportedly air in a Saturday teatime slot, and ITV bosses are hoping that it can bring a new ‘dynamic’ to the hugely popular show. 
Michael Kelpie, an executive producer on The Chase, said: ‘They know each other’s strengths and weaknesses, they’ve discussed a strategy beforehand but of course, that can all mean nothing when they go face-to-face against one of the UK’s finest quiz brains.’ 
‘The Family Chase complements both the daytime weekday and celebrity primetime shows. With even more fun and banter between Bradley, chasers and the families, it still delivers all the core values that has made The Chase a firm favourite with the viewers.’ 
ITV are yet to formerly confirm the show – but we’re seriously hoping that this happens and have contacted them to find out a bit more
